alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Randolph, northeastern Tallapoosa and northern Chambers Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Woodland to near Dadeville. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Wedowee, Stroud, La Fayette, Jacksons` Gap, Wadley, Woodland, Five Points, Post Oak Forks, Abanda, Standing Rock, Welch, Trammel Crossroads, Ridge Grove, Buffalo, Fredonia, Veasey Creek Park and Crystal Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
